title: Mass Champion Release
body: What if riot decided to release 3-5 champions at once? I know their would be various balancing issues, but they could simply release one at a time, and as soon as it is balanced out, they release the next one. This would create a whole lot of hype around League of Legends with everyone anticipating the next champion. I think I would enjoy this. What do you guys think?

replies.body: If they did this we wouldnt have any champs/updates for a while then the flood gates open 2 or so months later Kek

> they could simply release one at a time, and as soon as it is balanced out, they release the next one.

I thought that's what they're trying to do now, not that they're very good at it.
I'm always one for playing new champs. I don't even buy runes or rune pages, I just buy more champs
